mapper.select: select id, staff_id, user_name, user_pwd, organize_id, user_avatar, user_power, is_disabled, register_time, update_time, destroy_time, comment, bucket_avatar from login_user where staff_id = #{staffId}
mapper.insert: insert into login_user(id, staff_id, user_name, user_pwd, organize_id, user_avatar, user_power, is_disabled, register_time, update_time, destroy_time, comment, bucket_avatar) values (#{id,}, #{staffId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{organizeId}, #{userAvatar}, #{userPower}, #{isDisabled}, #{registerTime}, #{updateTime}, #{destroyTime}, #{comment}, #{bucketAvatar})

insert into login_user(staff_id, user_name, user_pwd, organize_id, user_avatar, user_power, is_disabled, register_time, update_time, destroy_time, comment, bucket_avatar) values
(#{entity.staffId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.userPwd}, #{entity.organizeId}, #{entity.userAvatar}, #{entity.userPower}, #{entity.isDisabled}, #{entity.registerTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.destroyTime}, #{entity.comment}, #{entity.bucketAvatar})

insert into login_user(staff_id, user_name, user_pwd, organize_id, user_avatar, user_power, is_disabled, register_time, update_time, destroy_time, comment, bucket_avatar) values
(#{entity.staffId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.userPwd}, #{entity.organizeId}, #{entity.userAvatar}, #{entity.userPower}, #{entity.isDisabled}, #{entity.registerTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.destroyTime}, #{entity.comment}, #{entity.bucketAvatar})
on duplicate key update staff_id = values(staff_id), user_name = values(user_name), user_pwd = values(user_pwd), organize_id = values(organize_id), user_avatar = values(user_avatar), user_power = values(user_power), is_disabled = values(is_disabled), register_time = values(register_time), update_time = values(update_time), destroy_time = values(destroy_time), comment = values(comment), bucket_avatar = values(bucket_avatar)
mapper.update:
update login_user
staff_id = #{staffId},
user_name = #{userName},
user_pwd = #{userPwd},
organize_id = #{organizeId},
user_avatar = #{userAvatar},
user_power = #{userPower},
is_disabled = #{isDisabled},
register_time = #{registerTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
destroy_time = #{destroyTime},
comment = #{comment},
bucket_avatar = #{bucketAvatar},
where id = #{id}
